---
title: "Minimal Example"
format: html
filters:
  - ripper
extensions:
  ripper:
    include-yaml: false
---

This example extracts only the code, without YAML headers or chunk options.

```{r}
#| label: simple-calculation
x <- 1:10
mean(x)
```

```{python}
#| label: python-calculation
numbers = list(range(1, 11))
print(sum(numbers) / len(numbers))
```

You can see the extracted code files generated by the `ripper` filter in the output directory after rendering this document. The files can be viewed here:

- [R Script](qripper-minimal.R)
- [Python Script](qripper-minimal.py)
